AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Mad scientist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Wishing for a perfectly deterministic universe [PAWN_nameDef] spent [PAWN_possessive] days crafting predictive algorithms. After another failed attempt due to the irrational feelings of races like the humans, rockmen and mantis, [PAWN_nameDef] came to a cold horrible realisation. The only way the universe will be balanced would be without those races. [PAWN_nameDef] started his mechanoid program with outstanding results.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Mantis slave
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: During a transit between worlds [PAWN_nameDef] ship was boarded by a Mantis war party and [PAWN_pronoun] was enslaved to be their mechanic. After numerous beatings and torture all [PAWN_nameDef] will to fight was broken. [PAWN_pronoun] became skilled at fixing mantis ships and begging for [PAWN_possessive] life.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Engi representative
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a natural born leader known for [PAWN_possessive] ability to make any horrible circumstance into a win/win situation. [PAWN_pronoun] quickly rose to the diplomatic rank of an Engi representative in the federation. Working tirelessly [PAWN_nameDef] made Engi home sectors free of Mantis slavers with the help of federation fleets, at the expense of contracting them more Engi engineers.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Naturalist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] renounced [PAWN_possessive] speciesâ€™ obsession with technology and touched down on a empty planet to live off the land in isolation. [PAWN_pronoun] had to do everything for himself including building shelters, growing food and crafting simple clothes and tools. In his spare time [PAWN_nameDef] befriended the local wildlife.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Ship builder
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Needing work [PAWN_nameDef] applied to the Varcalia ship yards to help build federation stealth cruisers. Starting as a mere plasma welder [PAWN_nameDef] worked [PAWN_possessive] way up with pure elbow grease until [PAWN_pronoun] found herself as a team leader of a plasma welding team. Sometimes when [PAWN_pronoun] watches those ships fly into a sea of stars [PAWN_pronoun] wonders if [PAWN_pronoun] could be more than what [PAWN_pronoun] is.
